resources.string: List of all PHP extensions, part of them can be enabled or disabled
Install default files (index.php, config.ini, …) to document root
Error: document root directory not empty
Disabling opcache because document root is not writable
New version of PHP(%1$s) is available, do you want to install it?
Cannot start server - document root directory does not exist

This is totally free and open source app that works using PHP built-in server and can be started automatically on boot.

PHP has these extensions: %1$s

Recommended for usage: in development or for very small websites with very small amount of visitors, cause this server supports only one request at a time.

Author

Tautvydas Andrikys, esminis@esminis.lt

Russian translation

Бондарев Дмитрий, fserg37@gmail.com

This is short manual of some important parts of application:

Server document root by default is sdcard/www so put files there.

PHP configuration is in php.ini file which is loaded from document root, edit it as you need(but if you change it dont forget session.save_path and upload_tmp_dir).

PHP locales will not work - setlocale and such.
